sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d" table="x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1"> <x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1 action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <ars_id display_value="ARS 3.1">43903e93dbcd1010280df36f299619aa</ars_id> <assessment_methods_and_objects>Systems processing, storing, or transm</assessment_methods_and_objects> <assessment_objective>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Determine if:(i) The organization establishes privacy roles, responsibilities, and access requirements for contractors and service providers;(ii) The organization includes privacy requi</assessment_objective> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <assurance/> <baseline>High; Moderate; Low</baseline> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  The organization: a. Establishes privacy roles, responsibilities, and access requirements for contractors and service providers; b. Includes privacy requirements in contracts and other acquisition-related documents; andc. Reviews, every two (2) years, a random sample of agency contracts that provide for the maintenance of a system of records on behalf of the agency to accomplish an agency function, to ensure that the contracts include clauses that make all requirements of the Privacy Act apply to the system and that make the criminal penalty provisions of the Privacy Act apply to the contractor or service provider and its personnel.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Accountability, Audit, and Risk Manage">c7877dfcdb211010280df36f299619d2</control_family> <control_name>Privacy Requirements for Contractors and Service Providers</control_name> <control_number>AR-03</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>AR-03</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  High:  PRIV.1- The contract or other acquisition-related documents must flow-down privacy and security clauses to ensure sub-con</implementation_standards> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>true</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>true</moderate> <number>ARSC0011247</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:32</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>3</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>CFR: 48 C.F.R. Part 24.102, 48 C.F.R. Part 39.105, 45 C.F.R. ยง164.504(e); 45 C.F.R. ยง164.530(c); Code: 5 U.S.C. ยง552a(m); FAR: Part 24; OMB Circular A-130: 7.g.; Privacy Act: ยง552a(m)</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls>AR-1, AR-5, SA-4</related_controls> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>Guidance for systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Contracts and other acquisition-related documents provide an enforceable means to ensure privacy and security controls are provided for PII shared with or disclosed to recipients outside of the organization, such that contractors and service providers protect PII in the same way the organization does.Contractors and service providers include, but are not limited to, information providers, information processors, and other organizations providing information system development, information technology services, and other outsourced applications. Organizations consult with legal counsel, the Senior Official for Privacy (SOP), and contracting officers about applicable laws, directives, policies, or regulations that may impact implementation of this control.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:32</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>cf877dfcdb211010280df36f299619f2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-22 16:07:09</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
